content: this text is about a legal case in croatia involving the coownership of a house and courtyard the court has decided to dissolve the coownership and sell the property at a public auction the proceeds from the sale will be divided among the coowners based on their shares of ownership the decision to sell the property was made according to article 50 of the property act the court also considered objections regarding the size of the coownership shares and proposals to prove exclusive ownership of specific parts of the property the parties involved had the choice to agree on a way to end the coownership but they decided to sell the property instead
